/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment.
